amendment.description: To protect the Second Amendment rights of veterans and their families.

vote.text: Amendment SA 720, under the order of 4/16/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 44. Record Vote Number: 102.

action.text: Amendment SA 720 proposed by Senator Burr.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 720, under the order of 4/16/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 44. Record Vote Number: 102.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 720, under the order of 4/16/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 44. Record Vote Number: 102.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 720 proposed by Senator Burr.
